content.text:
# 2023 Queen's Club Championships

/ 16
| surface = Grass
| category=ATP Tour 500 series
| prize_money=€2,195,175
| location=London, United Kingdom
| venue=Queen's Club
| champs= Carlos Alcaraz
| champd= Ivan Dodig /  Austin Krajicek
| main_name=Queen's Club Championships
}}
The '''2023 Queen's Club Championships (also known as the Cinch Championships''' for sponsorship reasons) was a men's professional tennis tournament played on outdoor grass courts at the Queen's Club in London, United Kingdom from 19 to 25 June 2023. It was the 120th edition of the event and was classified as an ATP Tour 500 tournament on the 2023 ATP Tour.
Champions
Singles
*  Carlos Alcaraz def.  Alex de Minaur, 6–4, 6–4
Doubles
*  Ivan Dodig /  Austin Krajicek def.  Taylor Fritz /  Jiří Lehečka, 6–4, 6–7(5–7), [10–3]

Other entrants
The following players received wildcards into the main draw:
*  Liam Broady
*  Jan Choinski
*  Ryan Peniston
The following player received entry using a protected ranking:
*  Milos Raonic
The following player received entry as a special exempt:
*  Jordan Thompson
The following players received entry from the qualifying draw:
*  Grigor Dimitrov
*  Arthur Fils
*  Mackenzie McDonald
*  Tommy Paul
The following players received entry as lucky losers:
*  Alexei Popyrin
*  Arthur Rinderknech
*  J. J. Wolf
Withdrawals
*  Matteo Berrettini → replaced by  J. J. Wolf
*  Marin Čilić → replaced by  Emil Ruusuvuori
*  Arthur Fils → replaced by  Arthur Rinderknech
*  Yoshihito Nishioka → replaced by  Maxime Cressy
*  Milos Raonic → replaced by  Alexei Popyrin
